sentences.en: A daredevil parachutist jumped from the top of Tower Bridge today.
sentences.cn: 一位大胆鲁莽的跳伞者今天从伦敦塔桥的桥顶跳了下去。

sentences.en: a fallen tree bridging the stream
sentences.cn: 倒下来架在小溪上的树

sentences.en: A river boat passed under the bridge.
sentences.cn: 一条内河船从桥下经过。

sentences.en: Alvin managed to bridge the gap between ballet and modern dance.
sentences.cn: 阿尔文设法弥合了芭蕾舞和现代舞蹈之间的差异。

sentences.en: Below the bridge we could just discern a narrow, weedy ditch.
sentences.cn: 我们仅能依稀辨出桥下一条杂草丛生的窄沟。

sentences.en: Britain needs to bridge the technology gap between academia and industry.
sentences.cn: 英国需要弥合学术界和企业界之间的技术差距。

sentences.en: He walked back over the railway bridge.
sentences.cn: 他从铁路桥上走了回去。

sentences.en: I hear you had a very narrow escape on the bridge.
sentences.cn: 我听说你在桥上险些出事。

sentences.en: Jim Partridge chucked himself off some bridge or other.
sentences.cn: 吉姆·帕特里奇从某座桥上跳了下去。

sentences.en: Some of the houses nearest the bridge were on fire.
sentences.cn: 离桥最近的一些房屋着火了。

sentences.en: The bridge broke down in last earthquake.
sentences.cn: 那座桥在上次地震中坍塌了。

sentences.en: The bridge buckled in the storm.
sentences.cn: 那座桥在暴风雨中塌陷了。

sentences.en: The bridge is now open to two-way traffic.
sentences.cn: 这座桥现已双向通车了。

sentences.en: The bridge was high, jacked up on wooden piers.
sentences.cn: 桥很高，被几个大木墩托起。

sentences.en: The differences between our two cultures can be bridged if we continue to communicate.
sentences.cn: 如果保持沟通，我们两种文化之间的分歧可以消除。

sentences.en: The Lyric Theatre is presenting a new production of "Over the Bridge".
sentences.cn: 利里克剧院正在上演新排的《桥对面》。

sentences.en: The water sloshed around the bridge.
sentences.cn: 河水在桥的周围荡漾。

sentences.en: They are both down-and-outs, sleeping under the city's oldest bridge.
sentences.cn: 他俩都是无家可归的人，露宿在城市最古老的桥下。

sentences.en: They recreate themselves with playing bridge.
sentences.cn: 他们以打桥牌作消遣。

sentences.en: They saw themselves as a bridge to peace.
sentences.cn: 他们把自己看作实现和平的使者。

sentences.en: Two men were on the bridge-deck, steadying a ladder.
sentences.cn: 两名男子在船桥甲板上扶着一架梯子不让它摇晃。

sentences.en: We crossed a small iron bridge over a meandering stream.
sentences.cn: 我们穿过架在蜿蜒小河上的一座小铁桥。
